name: Our Soccer Ball Won't Let Anyone Get In The Way: 5v2!
name_original: Our Soccer Ball Won't Let Anyone Get In The Way: 5v2!
description:
This is a small game where I wanted to try making a soccer game. I might expand on this more in the future.

How to Play:
Try to keep the ball away from the defenders in the center as long as possible. If an offense player is tackled then that player will be knocked out for a few seconds.
**This game requires a controller.**

  • Joystick - move around
  • A Button - Ground pass / Select option when on a menu
  • B Button - Lob Pass

Credits:

Coding, Design, Character Models (Offense Players and Defense Bots) - Russ Moonbase

Character Models made with AssetForge https://assetforge.io/
Additional paid assets from Unity Asset Store and Humble Bundle were used.

Free Assets Used:
Farland Skies - Simple Cumulus by Borodar https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/farland-skies-si...
Low Polygon Soccer Ball Model by Ahmet Gencoglu https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/low-polygon-soccer-ball-84382
Bladers & Bludgeoning Free Sample Pack by Idia Software https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/blades-bludgeoning-free-sam...
